string-array.name: rules
string-array.item: The name of the game is Pig.
To begin, input the players\' name and press Start.
The player rolls the die repeatedly to accumulate round points.
If the player rolls a 1, they lose all of their round points on that turn and the turn will pass to the other player.
If the player holds, all round points they accumulated at that turn will be added to their total score.
If a player reaches 100 total points, they win and the game is over.
If the player somehow reaches 100 current round points then they automatically win, even without holding.
A player can skip their turn by pressing Hold even without rolling the die.
